column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The pizza itself was quite good. The toppings were fresh and flavorful
column2: the crust was flaky and delicious
column3: and the tomato sauce was just right. The price was reasonable
column5: especially compared with other deep dish joints around town (see my other pizza reviews). We were content after eating 4 of the 6 slices
column6: and I happily took the leftovers home with me.
